001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
015
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.WeakHashMap;
019
020public class Adam<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
021
022    public static final String HP_BETA_1 = "beta1";
023    public static final String HP_BETA_2 = "beta2";
024
025    private final Map<LinearCombination<N>, Pair<TypedVector<N>, TypedVector<N>>> adaptions = new WeakHashMap<>();
026
027    private N learningRate;
028    private N beta1;
029    private N beta2;
030
031    public Adam(N learningRate, N beta1, N beta2) {
032        this.learningRate = learningRate;
033        this.beta1 = beta1;
034        this.beta2 = beta2;
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
039        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getNumberTypeSupport();
040
041        Pair<TypedVector<N>, TypedVector<N>> adaptions = this.adaptions.computeIfAbsent(model, k -> Pair.mutable(null, null));
042        TypedVector<N> m = adaptions.left();
043        TypedVector<N> v = adaptions.right();
044
045        Array<N> parameters = model.getParameters();
046        Vector<N> thetas = new TypedVector<>(parameters, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport());
047        TypedVector<N> regularizationGradients = (TypedVector<N>) Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
048
049        // m = β1 * m + (1 - β1) * g
050        TypedVector<N> secondTermM = regularizationGradients.multiply(typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta1));
051        m = m == null ? secondTermM : m.multiply(beta1).add(secondTermM);
052
053        // v = β2 * v + (1 - β2) * g^2
054        TypedVector<N> gradientSquared = Vectors.squared(regularizationGradients);
055        TypedVector<N> secondTermV = gradientSquared.multiply(typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta2));
056        v = v == null ? secondTermV : v.multiply(beta2).add(secondTermV);
057
058        // Store the results
059        adaptions.setLeft(m);
060        adaptions.setRight(v);
061
062        // Bias correction
063        N beta1T = typeSupport.pow(this.beta1, step);
064        N beta2T = typeSupport.pow(this.beta2, step);
065        N oneMinusBeta1T = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta1T);
066        N oneMinusBeta2T = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta2T);
067
068        TypedVector<N> mHat = m.multiply(typeSupport.inverse(oneMinusBeta1T));
069        TypedVector<N> vHat = v.multiply(typeSupport.inverse(oneMinusBeta2T));
070
071        // θ = θ - α * m̂ / (sqrt(v̂) + ε)
072        TypedVector<N> vHatSqrt = Vectors.squareRoot(vHat); // element wise sqrt
073        TypedVector<N> denom = vHatSqrt.add(typeSupport.epsilon()); // epsilon is scalar, broadcasts
074
075        return Vectors.divide(mHat, denom).multiply(model.getNumberTypeSupport().negate(learningRate));
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
080        return Map.of(
081                HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate,
082                HP_BETA_1, beta1,
083                HP_BETA_2, beta2);
084    }
085
086    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
087    @Override
088    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
089        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
090            this.learningRate = (N) value;
091        }
092        if (HP_BETA_1.equals(name)) {
093            this.beta1 = (N) value;
094        }
095        if (HP_BETA_2.equals(name)) {
096            this.beta2 = (N) value;
097        }
098    }
099
100    public N getBeta1() {
101        return beta1;
102    }
103
104    public void setBeta1(N beta1) {
105        this.beta1 = beta1;
106    }
107
108    public N getBeta2() {
109        return beta2;
110    }
111
112    public void setBeta2(N beta2) {
113        this.beta2 = beta2;
114    }
115}
